title: Is there no patch today then?
body: I thought it was changed to wednesday?

replies.body:
Hi folks,

Apologies for the confusion here - as some of you have noticed the deploy is tomorrow, not today - [official post here](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/jNJ3VRf9-scheduled-maintenance-patch-516-20082015)  

For context - this is because the global release timeline was pushed back by a day (for fixes and testing). Oceania will still be the first region deployed to.

Cheers
Mindstar

Yup the patch has been delayed until tomorrow, On 20/08/15, starting at 04:00 Sydney Time (18:00 UTC), ranked queues will be disabled in preparation for patch 5.16. At 05:30 Sydney Time (19:30 UTC), the servers will be shut down and all games currently in progress will end in a draw and stats will not be recorded. We estimate the battlegrounds will be unavailable for 3 hours.

Source: http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#oce

Hmmm

"TL:DR Starting with patch 5.16, Oceania will be the first region in the world to receive future patches. Our patch day will now be Wednesday mornings instead of Thursday mornings."


"TL:DR Starting with patch 5.16"


"patch 5.16"


Not sure if this means they'll start after this one or whether they meant to start with this one, my best guess is they're behind schedule or they're starting after this one.

Thing is patch notes usually go up in the news section the day before the patch is planned to be released. If Riot were going to release 5.16 tomorrow then I'm quite confident the patch notes would be on the website, while there is currently no sign of them. In fact I haven't even seen an announcement for the patch (not even on NA or EUW). Likely case is Riot is releasing 5.16 next week instead.

> [{quoted}](name=HeartVine,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=izuB5A7G,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-08-19T00:39:14.497+0000)
>
> Thing is patch notes usually go up in the news section the day before the patch is planned to be released. If Riot were going to release 5.16 tomorrow then I'm quite confident the patch notes would be on the website, while there is currently no sign of them. In fact I haven't even seen an announcement for the patch (not even on NA or EUW). Likely case is Riot is releasing 5.16 next week instead.

Uhh... nope.
Oh if that happens I'll be so sad, I've been waiting all this time for battle boss blitzy

Yeah i was told patch 5.16 would be released early this morning so obviously they're behind schedule, but since this is a huge patch it really doesn't surprise me and their are bound to be heaps of bugs too, it's a shame though because i was really looking forward to trying out the Darius changes and testing the new items out which look/sound completely awesome, especially for tank/ tanky DPS mains.
damn, wish we could be informed when things like this happen, especially for highly anticipated updates.
i was expecting a patch this morning, judging by how big this patch is its likely to be delayed.
